todos.content: Buy groceries: Eggs, milk, bread, and apples.
Call the plumber: Fix the leaking faucet in the bathroom.
Finish report: Complete the quarterly sales report for the team.
Walk the dog: Take Max for a 30-minute walk in the park.
Pay bills: Settle electricity, water, and internet bills by the end of the week.
Organize closet: Sort out clothes and donate unused items to charity.
Research vacation destinations: Plan a summer getaway and compare options.
Schedule dentist appointment: Book a check-up for next month.
Practice guitar: Learn a new chord progression and practice for 2 hour.
